name: the night of the new moon
name_original: the night of the new moon
description:
Tonight is the new moon; it is the the lunar new year. The grey area between 2021 and 2022 is ending, and Giorno Giovanna has fled somewhere.

What will happen now?

(This game is the final chapter of an existing story: April 6th, 2021. Context from the work is required to understand this game's narrative.)

Directions: Click or tap bold or highlighted text to advance to next passage.

Some passages will require you to select from one of multiple choice answers to proceed. At any time, you may hit the "back" arrow in the sidebar to return to the previous page.
